channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This Is the Best Sleeping Bag
item.description: The only problem with sleeping outside is that … you’re outside. Rumpl’s Wrap Sack solves all your crazy temperature woes.

item.title: X Data Center Fire in Oregon Started Inside Power Cabinet, Authorities Say
item.description: Generative AI has put data centers under the spotlight, and surging electricity needs could increase risk of fires.

item.title: User privacy app Cloaked adds AI-powered caller screening
item.description: Cloaked is releasing a new call guard feature to let an AI-powered bot chat to scammers on a user's behalf.

item.title: 14 Best USB Flash Drives (2025): Pen Drives, Thumb Drives, Memory Sticks
item.description: These WIRED-tested memory sticks are a virtual filing cabinet in your pocket.
